Reviews.Title: Sent the wrong batteries
Reviews.Author: giancarlo autenzio
Reviews.Content: They sent the correct charger but sent 2 wrong batteries. Charger works fine.  Not very satisfied about the batteries though.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Randy Jenkins
Reviews.Content: I felt this was an excellent value for the money.  Hard to beat for the amount of goodies you get. If you were buying this solely for the screen protectors and cleaning kit you may be a little disappointed.  The screen protectors are adhesive backed and the cleaning kit is inadequate to remove the sticky residue. It is still an excellent value without these, so I would buy again.  I chose one day shipping at checkout and had it in my hands in less than 24 hours.
